# Extended gamepad input names

**API Collection**

Constants for names of extended gamepad elements.

## Overview

Use these constants as the keys when accessing [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCExtendedGamepad] elements by name using the [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCPhysicalInputProfile/allElements] property, `subscript(_:)` notation, or similar [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCPhysicalInputProfile] APIs.

## Shoulder button names

- **GCInputLeftShoulder**: The name of the left shoulder button.
- **GCInputRightShoulder**: The name of the right shoulder button.

## Trigger names

- **GCInputLeftTrigger**: The name of the left trigger.
- **GCInputRightTrigger**: The name of the right trigger.

## Face button names

- **GCInputButtonMenu**: The name of the primary menu button element.
- **GCInputButtonHome**: The name of the home or logo button element.
- **GCInputButtonOptions**: The name of the secondary menu button.
- **GCInputButtonA**: The name for the controller’s A button.
- **GCInputButtonB**: The name for the controller’s B button.
- **GCInputButtonX**: The name for the controller’s X button.
- **GCInputButtonY**: The name for the controller’s Y button.

## Directional pad names

- **GCInputDirectionPad**: The name of the directional pad element.

## Thumbstick names

- **GCInputLeftThumbstick**: The name of the left thumbstick element.
- **GCInputRightThumbstick**: The name of the right thumbstick element.
- **GCInputLeftThumbstickButton**: The name of the left thumbstick button element.
- **GCInputRightThumbstickButton**: The name of the right thumbstick button element.

## Element names

- **GCPhysicalInputElementName**: The name of a physical input element.
- **GCPhysicalInputElementTypedName**: A type-safe name for accessing elements of a physical input element collection.
- **GCButtonElementName**: The names of the button elements.
- **GCAxisElementName**: The names for the elements that provide values along an axis.
- **GCSwitchElementName**: The name for an element that represents a switch.
- **GCDirectionPadElementName**: The names for directional pad elements.
- **DualShock controller input names**: Constants for names of DualShock 4 elements.
- **Xbox controller input names**: Constants for names of Xbox elements.
- **Micro gamepad input names**: Constants for names of micro gamepad elements.
- **Directional Gamepad Input Names**: Constants for names of directional pad elements.
